name: March 2017 - Hands On with React
description:
This will be your opportunity to create a real-life website using React.

We don't always get the opportunity to use the latest new technologies in our day-to-day jobs, and when we do get chance to pick up something we do so in our spare time and don't have a real problem that we're trying to solve.

This session will address that, by introducing the audience to React and then having members of the group contribute to the new NottsJS website.

What will I get out of this?

• Use React to:

• Build a Website.

• Use web components.


• Use 3rd party styling packages.


• Use webpack to hot load changes.


• Load data using Async processing of data.


• Contributing to an Open Source project.
